oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil Rights Timeline
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; King, Martin Luther, Jr.; desegregation; sanitation strike; timelines;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 29-page document containing a detailed timeline of the civil rights movement in Memphis from 1955 through 1968. Several pages contain handwritten annotations and the backs of the last three pages contain several handwritten notes. Title page reads, "History -- VII -- The Civil Rights War -- 1955-1967."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Webb, Arthur L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Lauren Peterson & Jordan Redmon
